modName: Additional Armor Chest for Eli's Breezehome
summary: Add's a copy of the upstairs armor chest in Eli's Breezehome to the downstairs armory. That's it!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Trebuchet MS]I always thought it was funny that the armory had no armor storage chest, so I decided to put one in for myself. The chest is to the left of the Weapons barrel and does not block any of the unique weapon placements.[/font]


[size=2]I did not create anything used in this mod, it is simply an addition to [b]Elnora's[/b] [b]Breezehome. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2829/?][color=#1e84cc]Full credit to Elnora[/color][u][color=#1e84cc] for the chest[/color][/u][/url][color=#1e84cc][u].[/u][/color] [/b]I copied the chest from the upstairs area and put it in the armory, that's it.[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=2]Nothing else was removed or added. Installing will not mess up the items already in the chest upstairs, as that chest is still there.[/size][/color]


[size=2] If I need to remove the texture or make my own let me know. I'm not sure how the rules on that work.
[/size]
[color=#1e84cc]From the permissions on Eli's Breezehome:[/color]
[list]
[*]Modification permission[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/contents/images/icons/tick.png[/img] You are allowed to modify my files and release bug fixes or improve on the features so long as you credit me as the original creator
[/list]
If this breaks any rules please let me know, and I'll do whatever I need to in order to correct my mistake.

[size=4]Requires: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2829/?][i]Breezehome by [b]Elianora[/b][/i][/url][/size]


[b][u][color=#1e84cc][size=3]To install:[/size][/color]
[/u][/b]
[b]NMM: [/b]Download with Nexus Mod Manager and activate.

[b]Manual:[/b] Copy the contents of the Data folder into The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim Special Edition\Data

[b]I suggest loading a save in which you do not currently reside within Breezehome.[/b]


[i][color=#1e84cc]Notes: [/color][/i]This is one of my first mods, just learning to use the creation kit and I am making small changes. I am not an expert and have probably made mistakes, if you spot any please let me know, I am still learning and would love the help!
author: Amnesiac

files.name: Additional Armour Container for Eli's Breezehome
